Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22869 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 25.0.3-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22869 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 25.0.3-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 25.0.3-11, affected by CVE-2025-22869
